**C2C or Sponsorship is&nbsp;NOT&nbsp;available for this position**&nbsp;   Job Title:&nbsp;Sr. Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)Job Type:&nbsp;Permanent/Direct HireJob Location:&nbsp;Marietta, GA - The client is still working remote, but will eventually move to a hybrid work schedule. Candidates based in Atlanta are preferred.&nbsp;Target years of Experience:&nbsp;4+ years of engineering experience   Top 3-5 Skillsets:  - Experience with AWS (The client is migrating to AWS right now).   
  - Senior level Linux administration experience&nbsp;   
  - Programming experience with Bash, Python, Ruby, Go, Java, or C/C++   
  - Experience building CI/CD & deployment pipelines&nbsp;   
   Preferred:  - Kubernetes experience   
   What this job is:Building automation of:  - Infrastructure   
  - Configuration   
  - Deployment of infrastructure   
  - Build/Test/Deploy/Release of code   
  - Maintain log shipping best practices, including tagging, tracing, alerting and analysis tools.   
  - Maintain monitoring and observe of applications and systems.   
  - Deploy and maintain healthy, performance, compliant platforms (Linux, dependencies, application servers, database).   
  - Build and maintain pipelines for CI, CD and deployment.   
  - Writing Infrastructure as code (Terraform)   
   Tech Stack:&nbsp;&nbsp;Linux, Chef, Puppet, Terraform, Jenkins, AWS.   Team Dynamics:&nbsp;Agile environment.
